User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account in the ShareFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

username.description: The chosen display name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Question.title: Question
Question.description: Represents a question posted by a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who posted the question.

description.description: A detailed description of the question.

creationDate.description: The server timestamp when the question was created.

tags.description: An array of tags associated with the question.

votes.description: The number of upvotes the question has received.

Answer.title: Answer
Answer.description: Represents an answer submitted by a user to a specific question.

userId.description: The UID of the user who submitted the answer.

questionId.description: The ID of the question this answer is for.

upvotes.description: The number of upvotes the answer has received.

downvotes.description: The number of downvotes the answer has received.

submissionDate.description: The server timestamp when the answer was submitted.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Access is restricted to the user themselves.
